VEF.Maps.ActiveTerrainDef.label: enriched soil
VEF.Maps.ActiveTerrainDef.description: Enriched soil. Allows crops to grow faster. Fertility depends on the underlying soil quality. Degrades over time but can be renewed with bone meal.

VEF.Maps.ActiveTerrainDef.label: enriched soil (Rich)
VEF.Maps.ActiveTerrainDef.description: Rich enriched soil with 20% total fertility. Will become weathered over time.
